title: Applying the Addition and Multiplication Rules
body: Carlos plays college soccer. he makes a goal 65% of the time he shoots. Carlos is going to attempt two goals in a row in the next game. A $$=$$ the event Carlos is successful on his first attempt. $$P(A)=0.65$$. B $$=$$ the event Carlos is successful on his second attempt. $$P(B)=0.65$$. Carlos tends to shoot in streaks. The probability that he makes hte second goal GIVEN that he made the first goal is $$0.90$$.
